subject: p14841168
History: Respiratory failure, intubation, evaluation for endotracheal tube placement.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. The tip of the endotracheal tube projects 5 cm above the carina. The tube could be advanced by 1 cm. Unchanged moderate-to-severe cardiomegaly with signs of mild-to-moderate pulmonary edema and a moderate right-sided pleural effusion. Bilateral areas of atelectasis at the lung bases. No pneumothorax. Right PICC line in unchanged position.
